titles.title: Third Sunday in Ordinary Time Year C Psalms

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Your words, O Lord, are Spirit and life.

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines:
The fear of the LORD is pure,
abiding for ever.
The judgments of the LORD are true;
they are, all of them, just.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
May the spoken words of my mouth,
the thoughts of my heart,
win favor in your sight, O LORD,
my rock and my redeemer!
